#summary Projects using the Micropendous

== Morse Keyboard ==

[http://code.google.com/p/morsekeyboard/ Morse Keyboard]: Connect an iambic keyer to type in Morse Code.  This firmware was designed with an earlier version of [http://www.fourwalledcubicle.com/LUFA.php LUFA/MyUSB].  It works with the [http://www.fourwalledcubicle.com/files/MyUSB/MyUSB%201.5.3.zip MyUSB] release.


== Open Hardware Projects Based on USB AVRs ==

[http://code.google.com/p/uhttpd-avr/ uhttpd-avr]: microHTTPD server based on modified uIP-1.0 stack, running on AVR processor and ENC28J60

[http://code.google.com/p/lwip-avr/ lwip-avr]: Port of lwip (open source TCP/IP stack) to 8bit AVR MCU

[http://code.google.com/p/bicycleledpov/ BicycleLEDPOV]: Persistence-of-Vision display for a bicycle wheel.

[http://dorkbotpdx.org/blog/feurig/benito_7_the_next_big_thing Benito7]: Serial-Over-USB AVR Programmer
